entry.data:
ISOLATED THUNDERSTORMS
SCATTERED SHOWERS THIS MORNING, THEN SHOWERS THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SCATTERED SHOWERS WITH ISOLATED THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING

HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
